channel.title: Notes on PHYS52015 – Introduction to HPC
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on PHYS52015 – Introduction to HPC

item.title: Introduction and motivation
item.description: Introduction # This course provides a brief introduction to parallel computing. It focuses on those paradigms that are prevalent in scientific computing in academia. There are other parallel programming models which we will mention in passing where appropriate. Task I think I have arranged for you to have a Hamilton account. Follow the instructions in that guide to log in and check that you can access Hamilton. If you can’t access Hamilton, get in touch with me!
